name: Osso Bucco
recipeInstructions: Season, dredge and sear the veal shanks on a medium high heat with olive oil and butter for 5 minutes on each side..
Set aside the veal shanks and saute the onion, carrot and celery for about 5 minutes until softened.
Add the garlic and saute for another 30 seconds
Add the veal, tomatoes and stock.
Add the bay leaf and bouquet garnet.
Cover and cook in the oven on 160C for 2 to 2 1/2 hours.
